ca.ualberta.taskr.controllers

Class UserController

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.controllers.UserController

  • public class UserController

    UserController class. This class is responsible for passing information to and From SharedPreferences for storage of user information between activities and between use sessions

    See Also:
    SharedPreferences, SharedPreferences

    • Constructor Summary

      UserController(android.content.Context context)
      UserController class. This class is responsible for passing information to and From SharedPreferences for storage of user information between activities and between use sessions

        Set the locally stored user in shared prefs
